data.event: Founded in 1893, it was located at the west portal of the original Cascade Tunnel under Stevens Pass.

event.title: March 1, 1910 Wellington avalanche, the worst avalanche in United States history, in which 96 people died

data.event: It is infamous for being the site of the March 1, 1910 Wellington avalanche, the worst avalanche in United States history, in which 96 people died.
Tye was abandoned in 1929 when the second Cascade Tunnel came into use.

event.title: 1910, the little town of Wellington, Washington was assailed

data.event: For nine days at the end of February 1910, the little town of Wellington, Washington was assailed by a terrible blizzard.
